game.name: Mini Golf Arena
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Sports, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Mini Golf Arena"는 최대 24 명의 플레이어가 온라인으로 즐길 수 있는 재미있는 멀티 플레이어 미니 골프 게임입니다. 친구들과 함께 맵을 만들고 플레이 해보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mini Golf Arena is an exciting multiplayer mini golf game for up to 24 players online. Build & play custom maps together with your friends.

reviewHighlights.text: cancerous golf, is the best golf
